content: maribel topper 2025 by petra breakstone maribel topper the perfect litter topper for your shoulders it s easy to knit in the round from the top down with a slightly rolled neckline the yarns i used are colorful soft and they drape well there are increases and simple eyelets in the top part and the bottom is knitted with two yarns held together mushing the colors a bit it s fun the blocked topper measures 11 in height and 97 around the bottom edge the pattern is fully written enjoy the knit yarn abbreviations c1 - a lustrous skein in sport weight 380 c1 2 - color 1 2 yards/100 grams in 70% cotton/30% viscose co - cast on c2 - a linen skein in a fingering weight 197 eor - end of round yards/50 grams in a 50/50 linen/viscose k - knit k2tog - knit 2 stitches together knit kits/yarns at yarnz2go lhn - left hand needle repeat - repeat sts - stitches notions needed yo - yarn over two us size 3 3 25 mm circular needles one 16 42 cm and one 36 91 cm in lengths techniques applied us 8 5 mm circular needle 36 91 cm in length knitted in the round increases knitting 1 stitch marker with one and two yarns held together tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing stretchy bind off weaving in ends and blocking gauge level of expertise 19 sts and 26 row in 4 of stockinette stitch with us3 needle and c1 yarn easy © petra breakstone enjoy your project page 1 of 2 maribel topper 2025 by petra breakstone part 1 getting started part 7 sixth increase with c1 and size 3 short needle with c1 and size 3 longer needle c0 88 sts i used the easy loop method round 1 k7 yo repeat to eor 264 sts see video link here rounds 2 to 6 knit knit 10 rounds part 8 eyelets without increases with c1 and size 3 longer needle part 2 first increase with c1 and size 3 short needle round 1 k6 k2tog yo repeat to eor 264 sts round 2 knit round 1 k4 yo repeat to eor 110 sts rounds 2 to 6 knit part 9 knit with c1 & c2 held together and size 8 needle part 3 second increase rounds 1 to 20 knit with c1 and size 3 short needle round 1 k5 yo repeat to eor 132 sts part 10 stretchy bind off rounds 2 to 6 knit with c1 only and size 8 needle k2 place both sts on lhn and knit together through back loop continue to k1 place both part 4 third increase sts on lhn and knit together through back loop with c1 and size 3 short needle to end of row cut yarn feed end through loop and tighten round 1 k4 yo repeat to eor 165 sts rounds 2 to 6 knit finishing weave in ends and block for best results
